confirm-unlock.name: Confirm unlock
confirm-unlock.description: You think this is overkill, I think this is not enough, as I will still somehow find a way to accidentally exit on chapter 6 throat of the world for the 4th time

disable-restart.name: Disable restart
disable-restart.description: doesn't let you click r or restart button in pause menu

disable-dt.name: Disable death tracker button
disable-dt.description: Opening death tracker in top 10000 cheese just uhh, crashes your game for no reason, and let's not talk about the top 10000 cheese room 14 incident

options-disabled.name: Disable options from pause menu
options-disabled.description: Various mod menus support the entire settings menu (not the small one you normally see) inside the pause menu, which obviously leads to a bunch of ways to crash

auto-enable.name: Auto enable
auto-enable.description: Automatically relocks when entering a level in case you unlocked last time, this is not overkill I swear

mod-on.name: lock exit
mod-on.description: you can switch it on and off here or in pause menu
